          <title>
            <string language="en">Phases of waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasen der Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phases des vagues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fases das ondas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasi delle onde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσεις κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fases de ondas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration of a sinusoidal wave shows different phases at different point along the wave.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sinusoidal waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transverse waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung einer sinusförmigen Welle zeigt 
unterschiedliche Phasen am unterschiedlichen Punkt entlang der Welle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration d'une vague sinusoïdale 
montre différentes phases au point différent le long de la vague.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração de uma onda sinusoidal mostra 
fases diferentes no ponto diferente ao longo da onda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione di un'onda sinusoidale 
mostra le fasi differenti a punto differente lungo l'onda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση ενός ημιτονοειδούς κύματος 
εμφανίζει διαφορετικές φάσεις στο διαφορετικό σημείο κατά μήκος
του κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración de una onda sinusoidal muestra 
diversas fases en diversa punta a lo largo de la onda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sinusförmige Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues sinusoïdales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues transversales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas transversais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde trasversali</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκάρσια κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas sinusoidales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
